brand_identity.name: Roland Corporation
brand_identity.description: World leader in electronic musical instruments

products.name: TR-808 Rhythm Composer
products.short_description: The drum machine that defined hip-hop and electronic music.
products.description: Introduced in 1980, the TR-808 was one of the first programmable drum machines. Originally intended as a studio tool for creating demos, it became a cornerstone of hip-hop, techno, and R&B. Its booming bass drum and crisp handclaps are instantly recognizable.

products.name: TR-909 Rhythm Composer
products.short_description: The foundation of house and techno music.
products.description: Released in 1983, the TR-909 blended analog synthesis with digital samples for hi-hats and cymbals. It was the first MIDI-equipped drum machine and its shuffle feel and punchy sounds fueled the house music revolution.

products.name: TB-303 Bass Line
products.short_description: The silver box that birthed Acid House.
products.description: An analog bass synthesizer released in 1981. Though a commercial failure as a bassist replacement, its squelchy, resonant filter was rediscovered by electronic musicians, creating the Acid House genre.

products.name: JUPITER-8 Synthesizer
products.description: The JUPITER-8 (1981) is widely considered one of the greatest analog synthesizers ever made. With 8 voices and a massive sound, it graced countless hit records in the 80s.

products.name: JUNO-106 Synthesizer
products.description: One of the most popular synthesizers of all time. Known for its stable DCOs, easy programming, and that legendary built-in analog chorus effect.

products.name: SH-101 Synthesizer
products.description: A battery-powered monophonic synth that became a favorite for techno and electro basslines. Designed to be worn with a modulation grip.

products.name: D-50 Linear Synthesizer
products.short_description: The first LA Synthesis digital classic.
products.description: Released in 1987, the D-50 was Roland's answer to the digital revolution. It combined PCM samples with digital synthesis (LA Synthesis) to create airy, atmospheric sounds.

products.name: SP-404MKII Creative Sampler
products.description: The latest in the legendary SP line. performance-based samplers. Beloved by beatmakers for its effects like Vinyl Sim and DJFX Looper.

products.name: RD-2000 Stage Piano
products.short_description: Revolutionary stage piano with dual sound engines.
products.description: Equipped with two independent sound engines, premium keyboard action, and extensive controller features, the RD-2000 delivers unmatched performance on stage and in the studio.

products.name: FANTOM-8 Synthesizer
products.short_description: The new creative hub for production and performance.
products.description: FANTOM is a new kind of creative hub, made for continuous creation. With a new expandable sound engine, computer integration, and best-in-class keyboard action.

products.name: Aerophone Pro AE-30
products.description: Aerophone Pro combines traditional sax fingering with Roland's most advanced digital sound engines, offering a level of expression and creativity never before available to wind players.

products.name: TD-50X V-Drums
products.description: The TD-50X is Roland’s most advanced V-Drums module ever, featuring Prismatic Sound Modeling and PureAcoustic Ambience technologies.

products.name: JD-800 Programmable Synthesizer
products.description: With its massive array of sliders, the JD-800 brought hands-on control back to the digital synthesizer era. Known for its crystal-clear, complex textures.

products.name: SYSTEM-700 Modular
products.description: Released in 1976, this massive modular system was Roland's statement of intent. Extremely rare and powerful.

products.name: RE-201 Space Echo
products.description: A tape-based delay and reverb unit that became a standard in studios worldwide. The warm, gritty echoes and spring reverb are legendary.

products.name: FP-90X Digital Piano
products.description: Features the PHA-50 hybrid keyboard and PureAcoustic Piano Modeling for the ultimate portable piano experience.

products.name: JUNO-X Synthesizer
products.short_description: The vintage JUNO spirit with modern power.
products.description: JUNO-X elevates the legendary JUNO synthesizer series into a new era, fusing authentic vintage spirit with modern creative power.

products.name: GO:PIANO88
products.description: Play piano anywhere with 88 full-size keys and high-quality Roland sounds. Wireless operation with battery power.

products.name: MC-505 Groovebox
products.description: Defined the 'Groovebox' category in the late 90s. Combining a synth engine, drum machine, and sequencer in one box for live performance.

products.name: JU-06A Boutique
products.short_description: The sound of the JUNO-60 and JUNO-106 in a module.
products.description: Part of the Roland Boutique series. It authentic recreates the sound of the vintage JUNO synths using ACB technology.
